ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matsubg.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matsubg.g | |- G = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_matbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_matplusg | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_grpsubpropd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` A ) ) |
